MessageHistory.Text: I've received $20 cash from you. Your debt is now $580
The drop is ready. You can find it outside apartment 2 of the western apartment block
I'm still currently waiting on a payment of <color=#46CB4F>$580</color>. Please deposit it into my stash box when you've got a chance.
I've received $580 cash from you. Your debt is now paid off.

I need a dead drop:
10x Low-Quality Pseudo
Got it. I'll let you know when it's ready. Should be about 5 hours
Hey, you've been great to work with so I'm willing to start doing in-person meetings with you. At a meeting, you buy as much pseudo as you can carry - no more order limits.
Just send me a text if you'd like to meet.
